mapper.insert: insert into t_fix_tender_transfer (FIX_BORROW_TRANSFER_ID, FIX_BORROW_ID, BORROW_ID, TENDER_ID, ACCOUNT, ACCOUNT_REAL, INTEREST, REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT, ADDTIME, ADDUSER, ADD_IP, ADD_MAC, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER, SUCCESS_TIME, ACCOUNT_YES, CONTRACT_NO, STATUS, REMARK, PLATFORM) values ( #{fixBorrowTransferId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fixBorrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tenderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountReal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentAccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=BIT})
